trans-unit.source: Provides a property and methods for writing event and exception information to the application's log listeners.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma propriedade e métodos para gravar informações de evento e de exceção para os ouvintes de log do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.Log` object provides a straightforward entry point from which to access the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]'s logging services.
trans-unit.target: O `My.Application.Log` objeto fornece um ponto de entrada simples de acessar o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]do log de serviços.

trans-unit.source: The `WriteEntry` and `WriteException` methods write messages to the application's log listeners.
trans-unit.target: O `WriteEntry` e `WriteException` métodos gravam mensagens de ouvintes de log do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The listeners can be configured by the application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Os ouvintes podem ser configurados pelo arquivo de configuração do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Changing Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-changing-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md) and [Working with Application Logs](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [passo a passo: alterando onde My.Application.Log grava informações](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-changing-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md) e [trabalhando com Logs de aplicativo](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs.md).

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.Log` object is available only for client applications.
trans-unit.target: O `My.Application.Log` objeto está disponível somente para aplicativos cliente.

trans-unit.source: For Web applications, use `My.Log`.
trans-unit.target: Para aplicativos Web, use `My.Log`.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.Log?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.Log?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Application.Log` object.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista exemplos de tarefas que envolvem o `My.Application.Log` objeto.

trans-unit.source: To
trans-unit.target: Para

trans-unit.source: See
trans-unit.target: Consulte

trans-unit.source: Write event information to the application's log listeners
trans-unit.target: Gravar informações de evento para ouvintes de log do aplicativo

trans-unit.source: [How to: Write Log Messages](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md)
trans-unit.target: [Como gravar mensagens de log](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md)

trans-unit.source: Write exception information to the application's log listeners
trans-unit.target: Gravar informações de exceção para os ouvintes de log do aplicativo

trans-unit.source: [How to: Log Exceptions](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-exceptions.md)
trans-unit.target: [Como registrar em log as exceções](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-exceptions.md)

trans-unit.source: Determine where `My.Application.Log` writes information
trans-unit.target: Determinar onde `My.Application.Log` grava informações

trans-unit.source: [Walkthrough: Determining Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)
trans-unit.target: [Instruções passo a passo: determinando onde My.Application.Log grava informações](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` method to log tracing information.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo mostra como usar o método `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` para registrar em log informações de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Write Log Messages](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [como: gravar mensagens de Log](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.AspLog" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.AspLog" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.AspLog" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.AspLog" />.

trans-unit.source: The `My.Log` object provides a straightforward entry point from which to access the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]'s logging services.
trans-unit.target: O `My.Log` objeto fornece um ponto de entrada simples de acessar o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]do log de serviços.

trans-unit.source: The listeners can be configured by the application's configuration file.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />.

trans-unit.source: The name to give to the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.Log.TraceSource" /> property object.
trans-unit.target: O nome a ser atribuído ao objeto da propriedade <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.Log.TraceSource" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.AspLog" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.AspLog" />.

trans-unit.source: The `My.Log` object provides a straightforward entry point from which to access the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]'s logging services.
trans-unit.target: O `My.Log` objeto fornece um ponto de entrada simples de acessar o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]do log de serviços.

trans-unit.source: The `WriteEntry` and `WriteException` methods write messages to the application's log listeners.
trans-unit.target: O `WriteEntry` e `WriteException` métodos gravam mensagens de ouvintes de log do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The listeners can be configured by the application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Os ouvintes podem ser configurados pelo arquivo de configuração do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Changing Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-changing-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md) and [Working with Application Logs](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [passo a passo: alterando onde My.Application.Log grava informações](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-changing-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md) e [trabalhando com Logs de aplicativo](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener" /> and adds it to the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource.Listeners" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener" /> e adiciona à coleção <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource.Listeners" />.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a new <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener>, sets its name to `FileLog`, and configures it to log messages with severity level <xref:System.Diagnostics.SourceLevels.Information> and greater.
trans-unit.target: Esse método cria um novo <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener>, define seu nome como `FileLog`e configura-o para registrar em log mensagens com nível de severidade <xref:System.Diagnostics.SourceLevels.Information> e maior.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener> object is then added to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource.Listeners%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.FileLogTraceListener> objeto é adicionado para o <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource.Listeners%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.Log.%23ctor%2A> calls the method if the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.Log.TraceSource%2A> property has not been configured.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.Log.%23ctor%2A> chama o método, se o <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.Log.TraceSource%2A> propriedade não foi configurada.

trans-unit.source: The trace source can be configured in the application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: A origem de rastreamento pode ser configurada no arquivo de configuração do aplicativo.
